thread.title: Is Big Data Analytics The Secret To Successful Fire Fighting?
thread.title_full: Is Big Data Analytics The Secret To Successful Fire Fighting?

author: Bernard Marr, Contributor
title: Is Big Data Analytics The Secret To Successful Fire Fighting?
text: Fire services, like most other public bodies, are awash with data. This data comes from sensors on equipment and fire engines and should be collected, integrated and used more effectively to give fire fighters (and the public) the information they need in real time.
